Package lia.Monitor.JiniClient.ReflRouter

Class Summary
IPTunnel IPTunnel is a link between two reflector nodes.
JtClient Same as lia.Monitor.tcpClient but without rcFrame
JtcpConn Same as tcpConn for JtClient
Main Main Class for the Reflector Router Jini Client It should compute the MST based on the ABPing results and compare the results with current reflector peers.
MDST Computes MDST like in VRVS client but with Reflector Router specifics Uses dijkstra & all.
MST Computes MST like in VRVS client but with Reflector Router specifics Uses the same Boruvka MST algorithm.
ReflNode ReflNode is the rcNode for the reflectors.
ReflRouter This is invoked by main class of JReflRouter client from time to time to compute the MST and issue the routing change commands to the reflectors.
